pages.text: The filtered hopper allows for selective separation of materials such as gravel or sand by using various filters.

More importantly, I'm able to filter $(l:innovation/materials/hellfire_dust)hellfire dust$() from ground up Netherrack through a Soul Sand filter.$(br2)I should make sure that the filtered hopper is mechanically powered from the side when processing Netherrack however...grinding up the remnants of ghasts is a hellish business, and without the stability provided by the mechanical power, I may find myself with a mess on my hands...
